DESCRIPTION: Unable to act for one turn.
Increases damage received by the amount of this mark, reduces damage dealt by the amount of this mark.
Damage dealt to monsters subtracts damage blocked by the monster's block amount.
Adds #yN copies of *Thought Derivative to your hand at the beginning of each turn and now.
Unique effect, the ability possessed by this keyword is unique, cannot be obtained again when there are existing abilities with the same name.
Using this card results in a kill.
Not affected by #y“As You Wish” responses and not easily affected by combo and energy changes.
